org.cpsolver.ifs.model

Interface Neighbour<V extends Variable<V,T>,T extends Value<V,T>>

  • Type Parameters:
    V - Variable
    T - Value
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    StudentMove
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BacktrackNeighbourSelection.BackTrackNeighbour, BranchBoundSelection.BranchBoundNeighbour, ExamRoomSwapNeighbour, ExamSimpleNeighbour, ExamSplitMoves.ExamMergeNeighbour, ExamSplitMoves.ExamShuffleNeighbour, ExamSplitMoves.ExamSplitNeighbour, LazyNeighbour, LazySwap, NeighbourSelectionWithSuggestions.SuggestionNeighbour, PriorityConstructionSelection.ConstructionNeighbour, RandomSwapMove.SwapNeighbour, RandomUnassignmentSelection.UnassignStudentNeighbour, SimpleNeighbour, StudentSwap, SwapStudentSelection.SwapStudentNeighbour

    public interface Neighbour<V extends Variable<V,T>,T extends Value<V,T>>
    IFS neighbour.

    IFS 1.3 (Iterative Forward Search)

        Perform assignment
        Parameters:
        assignment - current assignment
        iteration - current iteration

      • value

        double value(Assignment<V,T> assignment)
        Difference in the evaluation function, if this neighnour is assigned.
        Parameters:
        assignment - current assignment
        Returns:
        difference in the solution value when assigned

      • assignments

        Map<V,T> assignments()
        Return assignments to be done.
        Returns:
        list of assignments (including unassignments) of this neighbour
